revised_title: The Effectiveness of Blisters in Treating Coughs and Lung Infections
tldr: The author, Robert Whytt, investigates the use of blisters in treating coughs and lung infections, finding that they can significantly reduce the frequency of the pulse and alleviate symptoms in patients. Blisters were applied to various parts of the body, and the results showed that they provided relief in cases of infarction of the lungs and fever.
